title: If you play Cyberpunk 2077, does it mean you have a bad neuroethology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Please excuse my vernacular, but… What the flying fuck are you talking about? Neuroethology has to do with the evolutionary study of animal behavior. Why would playing games have anything to do with this? The field barely touches on humans at all. And why specifically Cyberpunk 2077? The game isn’t even out yet, so I’m a little confused why you latched onto that one in particular. I’m trying to take this question seriously, but it really feels like you just threw two things together and are trying to see what pops out.

response.answer_text: Errr…. Cyberpunk 2077 is a video game.Pretty colourful, most likely gracing subjects like transhumanism and “how much can you cut off a human before it’s not a human any more”. And maybe a side dish of “what can you allow a government to do” but how does that connect to… Neuroethology - Wikipedia The study of how animals react to external stimuli and how they take up these stimuli? Please elaborate!
